paragraph.paragraph:
Located in the View menu, named either Link context tool or Unlink context tool, this command allows you to switch between the two possible
00_introduction.xml addressing modes . It is also accessible through the main toolbar (
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_unify_stone_color.gif ).
paragraph.note: Note: This command only applies to the development window where it is invoked, and this setting is not automatically saved when exiting EiffelStudio.
